title: Display contacts from a specific account in Phone app
content:
Hi all,

How do I display contacts from only a specific account in the Phone app? In the contacts app, I can pick contacts from which account to be displayed. But not on the Phone app. I only want contacts from a specific Google account on the Phone app.

I have already disabled contacts sync for the accounts I don't need contacts from.

Thanks!
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
